title: Why Does My Plant Look Sad? 6 Tips For Raising Happy Houseplants
description: Eager to bring new plants home, but aren't sure where to begin? This episode will get you started with the basics of houseplant care — from watering schedule to light conditions. Because anyone can become a green thumb with a little time and attention.
